name: Instinct (itch)
description:
Instinct was made for a uni project. For the uni project, we need to make a game a week and this weeks theme was; two buttons, two colours.

Time mode: Complete the stages as fast as you can.

Zen mode: This is more for the chill factor but be warned, it goes for 4min. This will record the percentage of your zen at the end.

Controls:

[A] & [D]

Hold down one or both.

Safety Buttons:

[0] - to reset

[9] - menu
